text: Teresa Żylis-Gara (23 January 1930 – 28 August 2021) was a Polish operatic soprano. She had a major international career during the 1950s through the 1990s. She was a long-time member of the Metropolitan Opera in New York City. She is known for her roles in operas by Mozart, Puccini and Verdi. ==Notes== ==References== ==Other websites== * * Teresa Żylis-Gara (Soprano) Bach Cantatas Website * Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish stage actors Category:Polish singers Category:European opera singers
title: Teresa Żylis-Gara
